MISSION STATEMENT: MONITORING AND IMPLEMENTATION FRAMEWORK
GOAL STATEMENT: Working In Partnership
ACTION STATEMENT: The agri-food sector should proactively  inform the consumer agenda as well as  responding to it.

MISSION STATEMENT: MONITORING AND IMPLEMENTATION FRAMEWORK
GOAL STATEMENT: Working In Partnership
ACTION STATEMENT: DAFM should lead a multi-stakeholder  project, facilitated by ‘EIT Climate  KIC’ on a “Deep Demonstration”  activity, to develop a coordinated  set of innovation actions focusing on  aiding an environment and climate-led  transition to a climate neutral agri- food sector.

MISSION STATEMENT: A Climate Smart,  Environmentally  Sustainable   Agri-Food Sector
GOAL STATEMENT: Restore and Enhance Biodiversity
ACTION STATEMENT: Undertake a national land use review  and support the DECC led development  of a land use strategy.
stakeholders: Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine 004

MISSION STATEMENT: A Climate Smart,  Environmentally  Sustainable   Agri-Food Sector
GOAL STATEMENT: Enhance the Environmental Sustainability of the Seafood Sector
ACTION STATEMENT: It will be essential to maintain a level  playing field between the EU and UK  on issues such as the landing obligation  and technical conservation measures  to ensure the long-term conservation  of fish stocks and protect the ongoing  sustainability of the Irish fleet.

MISSION STATEMENT: A Climate Smart,  Environmentally  Sustainable   Agri-Food Sector
GOAL STATEMENT: Embed the Agri-Food Sector in the Circular, Regenerative Bioeconomy
ACTION STATEMENT: Research the extent of food loss at the  production (primary) stage in an Irish  context, and develop innovative ways  of reducing it.

MISSION STATEMENT: A Climate Smart,  Environmentally  Sustainable   Agri-Food Sector
GOAL STATEMENT: Strengthen and Invest in Origin Green and Other Sustainability Supports to Reflect the Higher Level of Ambition for the Agri-Food Sector
ACTION STATEMENT: Develop closer links to AKIS.

MISSION STATEMENT: A Climate Smart,  Environmentally  Sustainable   Agri-Food Sector
GOAL STATEMENT: Strengthen and Invest in Origin Green and Other Sustainability Supports to Reflect the Higher Level of Ambition for the Agri-Food Sector
ACTION STATEMENT: Further explore the health and  sustainability benefits of grass-based  food.

MISSION STATEMENT: A Climate Smart,  Environmentally  Sustainable   Agri-Food Sector
GOAL STATEMENT: Strengthen and Invest in Origin Green and Other Sustainability Supports to Reflect the Higher Level of Ambition for the Agri-Food Sector
ACTION STATEMENT: Communicate credible, market relevant  environmental and social sustainability  credentials to trade customers and  consumers in both national and  international markets.

MISSION STATEMENT: Viable & Resilient  Primary Producers  with Enhanced  Wellbeing
GOAL STATEMENT: Improve the Creation and Equitable Distribution of Value
ACTION STATEMENT: Ireland will engage fully with the  Commission work and continue to  develop national initiatives on market  and price transparency.

MISSION STATEMENT: Viable & Resilient  Primary Producers  with Enhanced  Wellbeing
GOAL STATEMENT: Improve the Creation and Equitable Distribution of Value
ACTION STATEMENT: Support the establishment of co- operatives and Producer Organisations  across all sectors of farming and  enhance the role of the fishery producer  organisations co-operatives.

MISSION STATEMENT: Viable & Resilient  Primary Producers  with Enhanced  Wellbeing
GOAL STATEMENT: Improve the Creation and Equitable Distribution of Value
ACTION STATEMENT: The fishing industry should explore  these arrangements to ascertain if  improvements in the first sale price can be  achieved for the different fleet segments.

MISSION STATEMENT: Viable & Resilient  Primary Producers  with Enhanced  Wellbeing
GOAL STATEMENT: Increase Primary Producer Diversification & Resilience
ACTION STATEMENT: The recommendations in the “Review  of Organic Food Sector and Strategy  for its Development 2019-2025”  should continue to be implemented and  reviewed, including taking on board  the new EU Organic Action Plan and its  three axes of boosting consumption,  increasing production, and improving  the sustainability of the sector.

MISSION STATEMENT: Viable & Resilient  Primary Producers  with Enhanced  Wellbeing
GOAL STATEMENT: Increase Primary Producer Diversification & Resilience
ACTION STATEMENT: See Goal 4 of the Mission on “A Climate  Smart, Environmentally Sustainable  Agri-Food Sector”.

MISSION STATEMENT: Viable & Resilient  Primary Producers  with Enhanced  Wellbeing
GOAL STATEMENT: Increase Primary Producer Diversification & Resilience
ACTION STATEMENT: See Goal 6 of the Mission on “A Climate  Smart, Environmentally Sustainable  Agri-Food Sector”.

MISSION STATEMENT: Viable & Resilient  Primary Producers  with Enhanced  Wellbeing
GOAL STATEMENT: Increase Primary Producer Diversification & Resilience
ACTION STATEMENT: See Goal 1 of the Mission on Viable  and Resilient Primary Producer with  Enhanced Well Being OTHER OPTIONS There are also a range of other options for  diversification, including The growing national and international trend  towards consumption of more fruit, vegetables and  whole-foods opens new opportunities to expand  existing commercial crop (horticultural and arable)  production and the growing of new commercial  crops including food protein crops (see also Goal 1,  actions 27 and 32).

MISSION STATEMENT: Viable & Resilient  Primary Producers  with Enhanced  Wellbeing
GOAL STATEMENT: Improve the Social Sustainability of Primary Producers
ACTION STATEMENT: Government will continue to focus on  Rural Development;       The Government has published a new rural  development policy, Our Rural Future 2021 to 2025.
stakeholders: Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine 004

MISSION STATEMENT: Food which is Safe,  Nutritious and  Appealing, Trusted  and Valued at Home  and Abroad
GOAL STATEMENT: Prioritise Coherent Food and Health Policies to Deliver Improved Health Outcomes
ACTION STATEMENT: Ensure that the healthy and sustainable  choice is made as accessible to  consumers as possible.

MISSION STATEMENT: Food which is Safe,  Nutritious and  Appealing, Trusted  and Valued at Home  and Abroad
GOAL STATEMENT: Prioritise Coherent Food and Health Policies to Deliver Improved Health Outcomes
ACTION STATEMENT: Promote best practice on labelling.

MISSION STATEMENT: Food which is Safe,  Nutritious and  Appealing, Trusted  and Valued at Home  and Abroad
GOAL STATEMENT: Increase Value add in Food & Drink Through Insight, Product Development and Differentiation
ACTION STATEMENT: Develop value-added functional foods  and ingredient solutions with proven  health benefits.

MISSION STATEMENT: Food which is Safe,  Nutritious and  Appealing, Trusted  and Valued at Home  and Abroad
GOAL STATEMENT: Increase Value add in Food & Drink Through Insight, Product Development and Differentiation
ACTION STATEMENT: Further develop on Bord Bia’s ‘Thinking  House’ model of targeting product and  market segments based on consumer  and market insights, while leveraging  regulatory expertise to ensure new  products and innovations are compliant  with relevant legislation.

MISSION STATEMENT: Food which is Safe,  Nutritious and  Appealing, Trusted  and Valued at Home  and Abroad
GOAL STATEMENT: Increase Value add in Food & Drink Through Insight, Product Development and Differentiation
ACTION STATEMENT: Industry will further leverage the  various sectoral technology centres  to further drive innovation, value- add, new product development and  reformulation, lean manufacturing,  automation, and circularity.

MISSION STATEMENT: Food which is Safe,  Nutritious and  Appealing, Trusted  and Valued at Home  and Abroad
GOAL STATEMENT: Develop Market Opportunities at Home and Abroad
ACTION STATEMENT: Support opportunities for direct local  sales e.

MISSION STATEMENT: Food which is Safe,  Nutritious and  Appealing, Trusted  and Valued at Home  and Abroad
GOAL STATEMENT: Develop Market Opportunities at Home and Abroad
ACTION STATEMENT: Defend and build market share in the  UK, building on British trade customer  and consumer confidence in Irish food  and drink as quality, trusted, sustainably  produced and ‘close to home’.

MISSION STATEMENT: Food which is Safe,  Nutritious and  Appealing, Trusted  and Valued at Home  and Abroad
GOAL STATEMENT: Develop Market Opportunities at Home and Abroad
ACTION STATEMENT: Increase efforts to gain and maintain  market access for key product categories  to priority international markets.
stakeholders: Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine 004

MISSION STATEMENT: An Innovative, Competitive & Resilient Agri-Food Sector, Driven by Technology and Talent
GOAL STATEMENT: Attract and Nurture Diverse and Inclusive Talent
ACTION STATEMENT: Education and training programmes  (note, education and training of  primary producers is also addressed  in Goal 4, Mission 2), including new  apprenticeships, will be kept under  review to ensure they respond to needs  such as in the areas of environmental  sustainability        (e.

MISSION STATEMENT: An Innovative, Competitive & Resilient Agri-Food Sector, Driven by Technology and Talent
GOAL STATEMENT: Attract and Nurture Diverse and Inclusive Talent
ACTION STATEMENT: Promote and develop initiatives to  improve diversity and inclusion      Diversity of people, talent, backgrounds and skills will  be critical to the future development of the sector and  all stakeholders will participate in this.

MISSION STATEMENT: An Innovative, Competitive & Resilient Agri-Food Sector, Driven by Technology and Talent
GOAL STATEMENT: Policy Coherence and Synergies in Sustainable Food Systems between Ireland’s Domestic Policy and its Development Cooperation and Foreign Policy
ACTION STATEMENT: Ireland will play a leadership role at the FSS in September 2021.
